comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content:
This image is also catalogued as D2886/A/2/15/6

The bride's father was Dr. Lawless who was in charge of Armagh Lunatic Asylum (now St. Luke's hospital) on the steps of which this photo was taken.

This photo is published in "The way we were - Historic Armagh photographs from the Allison collection" by Desmond Fitzgerald & Roger Weatherup

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thanks NIreland eye. See further info from this publication that has now been added to the description for this photo (see above) and others from the same wedding.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
